message: Which mental issues would be ok? Because some are more severe than others. How about our LEO's and military that suffer from PTSD/depression? Do the permit holders get grandfathered in or do they have to be evaluated now? Or do their medical records just get looked at? Which then lead to the question of how many people would NOT talk to their doctor because rights would be withheld. There are already too many folks who aren't willing to fill out forms we have because """"the governments gonna watch them"""". Who's going to check the medical records, Government or private companies? Will hippa laws have to be rewritten? I'm all for gun control, but this mental health issue is too big to resolve. It's not the way to go.

i guess you've never heard of the US black budget? i mean you're talking about two different animals here. Russia had just as many issues in Afghanistan as we did. guerilla warfare is always a threat to a large bulky military, that's how the Americans won the Revolutionary War for the most part. we had the same problems in Vietnam and in Iraq and Afghanistan. but wars between two """"equally"""" matched large nations are not even comparable. you're oversimplifying far too much. to win, they would have to invade us, not just repel an invasion. we DO have functional stealth, I'm surprised you dont realize that. we invented stealth almost forty years ago. China hasnt come close to matching our technology from 20 years ago. same with Russia. China has one advantage, a large army. Russia has one advantage, a more robust cyberwarfare department. in every other category, we are superior.
Doesn't solve the problem for the salmon. Climate change will create warmer stream runoff and the salmon can't survive in that.

Nice recitation of Fox news talking points. Have you travelled to Europe and actually talked to foreign people? I travelled to Europe 10 times between 2001-2007, and George Bush was considered a Nazi, much like his father and grandfather. I see no evidence of the Constitution being shredded for Shiria Law. Sharia Law is not very common in the Muslim World, much less in America. That would be like saying, """"America Lynches Black folks"""" based on looking at the Klan in the segregation days. Your whole construct is based on fallacy, therefore you are an Idiot.
